name: Octasouls
description: Octasouls is a very old game I've made, and is very akin to early 2010 indie horror game. Where you collect a certain amount of objects and evade entities hunting you down. It's a very short game and can be beaten in under 5 minutes... in the correct attempt that is. There is lore that you could find within the game if you're interested in that. Oh yeah, last warning the jump scares are loud.
